title: Lyre-back Sheraton side chair
description: side chair; style of Sheraton; pierced splat, below a curved crest rail, displays variation and combination of urn and lyre motifs and drapery swags enclosed within narrow, tapering uprights, the whole surmounted by carved cresting; seat, serpentine front, upholstered in green satin; straight, square tapering legs
creditline: Gift of James  F. and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
